entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 a.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 12:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: WNW 14 km/h

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 1. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
